title: Library Request: alpaca-py
body:
[alpaca-py](https://alpaca.markets/sdks/python/) is  required for me replicate trades from my alpaca account to IBKR from quantconnect.

Checklist
 I have completely filled out this template
 I have confirmed that this issue exists on the current master branch
 I have confirmed that this is not a duplicate issue by searching [issues](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/issues)
 I have provided detailed steps to reproduce the issue
